general.name: specObj-survey
general.description:
This file contains the list of all spectra for a given data release, with
associated parameters from the 2D and 1D pipelines for each.

changelog.description: Describes changes to the datamodel product and/or file structure from one release to another

header.comment: migration: description of keyword/column not found. Needs update
Version of sas used to create file
Version of tree used to create file

SURVEY.name: SURVEY
SURVEY.description: Survey that this object is part of
SURVEY.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

INSTRUMENT.name: INSTRUMENT
INSTRUMENT.description: Instrument that this spectrum was observed with (SDSS or BOSS)
INSTRUMENT.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

CHUNK.name: CHUNK
CHUNK.description: Name of tiling chunk that this spectrum was tiled in (boss1, boss2, etc), important for tracking large-scale structure samples
CHUNK.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

PROGRAMNAME.description: Program within each survey that the plate was part of
